Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Activity
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Course
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Conflict
    public class Course
extends Activity
    Course object contains a Course's name, title, section, credit hours, instructorId, and meeting time information. Courses can be added to a student's Schedule and to the Course Catalog in the WolfScheduler class
    Author:
    symone

              int startTime,
              int endTime)
        Constructs a Course object with values for all fields.
        Parameters:
        name - name of Course
        title - title of Course
        section - section of Course
        credits - credit hours for Course
        instructorId - instructor's id
        meetingDays - meeting days for Course as series of chars
        startTime - start time for Course
        endTime - end time for Course

        public void setSection​(java.lang.String section)
        Sets the Course's section. Throws an IllegalArgumentException with message "Invalid section." if section is null or does not contain three characters or three characters are not digits.
        Parameters:
        section - the section to set
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if section is null or empty String.

      • setCredits

        public void setCredits​(int credits)
        Sets the Course's credits. Throws an IllegalArugmentException with message "Invalid credits" if Course credit is out of bounds (less than 1 or greater than 5).
        Parameters:
        credits - the credits to set
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if credits are greater than 5 or less than 1

      • setMeetingDaysAndTime

        public void setMeetingDaysAndTime​(java.lang.String meetingDays,
                                  int startTime,
                                  int endTime)
        Checks meeting days do not consist of any characters other than ‘M’, ‘T’, ‘W’, ‘H’, ‘F’, or ‘A’. Checks if ‘A’ is in the meeting days list, if so ensures is is the only character. Throws IllegalArgumentException if meetingDays, startTime, or endTime fields are invalid (using criteria above).
        Overrides:
        setMeetingDaysAndTime in class Activity
        Parameters:
        meetingDays - the meeting days to set
        startTime - the start time to set
        endTime - the end time to set

        Checks if an activity object is a Course and whether that course is a duplicate
        Specified by:
        isDuplicate in class Activity
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity to be compared
        Returns:
        true if activity is a duplicate course
